readable.title: 2088910854_c6f8d4f5f9
readable.content: A large man is wearing a headband with mistletoe attached to it . A man in a sweatshirt and cap wears a flower on his head . A man wearing a black knit cap with a red and white striped headband with a flower on top . An man with a black ski cap and a red and white headband looks into the distance . Man wearing a black hat with a christmas theme .
